name: W.S.F.
description:
W.S.F - Wild Space Forces, where you are a brave madman who destroys asteroid shit and enemy planes. If you like it, welcome to the wilds of space.Four levels, four challenges, the ability to destroy, to become stronger thanks to amplifiers(ps-s, it's legal)

Enjoy!

Also, don't forget to leave feedback on my first game! Every flaw is important to me to improve the next games!

Movement*:
A,D - strafe

Left mouse button - shoot

Right mouse button or tap - restart level(in case if you lose)

Esc - pause

*Input for mobile device avaliable!
